company_context.name: ECHO
company_context.description: Building a game-based mobile application for hearing tests, to let users test their hearing right from their mobile and with their earphones, and get a clinical-level audiogram, all just by playing simple games of their choice

governing_assumptions.statement: Consistency matters more than viral spikes for B2B retention.
Users trust transparent communication over polished marketing.

posts.risk_notes: Governed by 2 assumption(s). (LOW) Consistency matters more than viral spikes for B2B retention. (LOW) Users trust transparent communication over polished marketing.
posts.hypothesis: By focusing on product education aligned with our belief that 'Consistency matters more than viral spikes for B2B retention.', we will drive engagement with Students.
